milestones.description: Clive Lloyd and Viv Richards's 152-run partnership is WI's highest for the 5th wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 139 between Viv Richards and Collis King
This is the highest match aggregate (450) involving teams West Indies & Sri Lanka in ODIs
de Silva has broken the record for playing the most ODIs (34) for SL, going past Duleep Mendis
Clive Lloyd and Viv Richards's 152-run partnership is the highest for the 5th wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 139 between Viv Richards and Collis King
